11.

a. 1010 1101 0001 0000 0000 0000 0000 0010

	Inteiro em comp2: 
		-2^31 + 2^29 + 2^27 + 2^26 + 2^24 + 2^20 + 2^1
		-2147483648 + 536870912 + 134217728 + 67108864 + 16777216 + 1048576 + 2
		-1 391 460 350

	Inteiro sem sinal
		2^31 + 2^29 + 2^27 + 2^26 + 2^24 + 2^20 + 2^1
		2147483648 + 536870912 + 134217728 + 67108864 + 16777216 + 1048576 + 2
		2 903 506 946
	
	Ponto Flutuante
		sinal: 1
		expoente: 0101 1010 = 90
		mantissa: 001 0000 0000 0000 0000 0010 =
				= 2^(-3) + 2^(-22)
				= 0.125 + 0.000000238418579101562500000000
				= 0.125000238418579101562500000000
		
		(−1)^sinal × (1 + Mantissa) × 2^expoente
		expoente = e - 127 = 90 - 127 = -37
		
		(-1)^1 x (1.06250011920928955078125) x 2^(-37)
		-1 x 1.125000238418579101562500000000 x 0.000000000007275957614183425903
		0.000000000008185454050679830117
	
	Instrução MIPS:
		opcode: 101011 = 2b_hexa => store word
		rs: 01000
		rt: 10000
		imediato: 0000 0000 0000 0010
		
		sw $16, 2($9)


b. 0010 0100 1001 0010 0100 1001 0010 0100

	Inteiro em comp2:
		2^29 + 2^26 + 2^23 + 2^20 + 2^17 + 2^14 + 2^11 + 2^8 + 2^5 + 2^2
		536870912 + 67108864 + 8388608 + 1048576 + 131072 + 16384 + 2048 + 256 + 32 + 4
		613 566 756
	
	Inteiro sem sinal
		igual ao anterior
	
	Ponto Flutuante
		sinal: 0
		expoente: 0100 1001 = 73
		mantisssa: 001 0010 0100 1001 0010 0100
				 = 2^(-3) + 2^(-6) + 2^(-9) + 2^(-12) + 2^(-15) + 2^(-18) + 2^(-21)
				 = 0.142857074737548828125000000000
		
		(-1)^sinal x (1+mantissa) x 2^(expoente-127)
		1 x 1.142857074737548828125000000000 x 2^(-54)
		1.142857074737548828125000000000 x .000000000000000055511151231257
		0.000000000000000063441311911468
	
	
	Instrução MIPS
		opcode: 001001 = 9_hexa -> Add Imediate Unsigned
		rs: 00100
		rt: 10010
		imediato: 0100100100100100
		
		addiu $10, 18724($4)
